edu.ou.asgbook.filters.MatchedFilter

edu.ou.asgbook.filters.MatchedFilter Class Reference

static void main (String[] args) throws Exception

Detailed Description

Convolve an image by a window that is akin to the features we want to extract.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.ou.asgbook.filters.MatchedFilter.MatchedFilter ( double  coeffs[][]  )  

00024                                             {
00025         this.coeffs = coeffs;
00026         if ( coeffs.length % 2 == 0 || coeffs[0].length % 2 == 0 ){
00027             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Dimensions of coefficients array needs to be odd");
00028         }
00029         // normalize
00030         double sum = 0;
00031         for (int i=0; i < coeffs.length; ++i){
00032             for (int j=0; j < coeffs[i].length; ++j){
00033                 sum += coeffs[i][j];
00034             }
00035         }
00036         System.out.println("Normalizing coefficients by " + sum);
00037         DecimalFormat df = new DecimalFormat("0.000");
00038         for (int i=0; i < coeffs.length; ++i){
00039             for (int j=0; j < coeffs[i].length; ++j){
00040                 coeffs[i][j] /= sum;
00041                 System.out.print(df.format(coeffs[i][j]) + "&"); // for LaTeX
00042             }
00043             System.out.println("\\\\");
00044         }       
00045     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.filters.MatchedFilter.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00083                                                             {
00084         // create output directory
00085         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("matched");
00086         
00087         // read input
00088         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00089         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "orig", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00090         
00091         for (int hx=1; hx <= 5; hx += 2){
00092             int hy = hx*2;
00093             double[][] coeffs = new double[2*hx+1][2*hy+1];
00094             for (int i=0; i < coeffs.length; ++i){
00095                 for (int j=0; j < coeffs[i].length; ++j){
00096                     int t = i + j;
00097                     if ( t < coeffs.length ) coeffs[i][j] = 1;
00098                 }
00099             }
00100             MatchedFilter filter = new MatchedFilter(coeffs);
00101             LatLonGrid sm = filter.match(popdensity);
00102             KmlWriter.write(sm, out, "northwest"+hx, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00103         }
00104         
00105         for (int hx=5; hx < 15; hx += 3){
00106             // int hx = 8;
00107             int hy = hx;
00108             double[][] coeffs = new double[2*hx+1][2*hy+1];
00109             for (int i=0; i < coeffs.length; ++i){
00110                 for (int j=0; j < coeffs[i].length; ++j){
00111                     int dx = i - hx;
00112                     int dy = j - hy;
00113                     if ( Math.abs(dx) < hx/2 && Math.abs(dy) < hy/2 )
00114                         coeffs[i][j] = 1;
00115                 }
00116             }
00117             MatchedFilter filter = new MatchedFilter(coeffs);
00118             LatLonGrid sm = filter.match(popdensity);
00119             KmlWriter.write(sm, out, "isolated"+hx, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00120         }
00121     }

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.filters.MatchedFilter.match ( final LatLonGrid  input  ) 

returns a grid with values in the range 0-100 

00050                                                    {
00051         LatLonGrid output = LatLonGrid.copyOf(input);
00052         output.setMissing(-1);
00053         output.fill(output.getMissing());
00054         int[][] outData = output.getData();
00055         int[][] inData = input.getData();
00056         final int hx = coeffs.length / 2;
00057         final int hy = coeffs[0].length / 2;
00058         final int nx = output.getNumLat();
00059         final int ny = output.getNumLon();
00060         for (int i=hx; i < (nx-hx); ++i){
00061             for (int j=hy; j < (ny-hy); ++j){
00062                 double tot = 0;
00063                 int totval = 0; // normalize values in window
00064                 for (int m=-hx; m <= hx; ++m){
00065                     for (int n=-hy; n <= hy; ++n){
00066                         double coeff = coeffs[m+hx][n+hy];
00067                         int inval = inData[i+m][j+n];
00068                         if (inval != input.getMissing()){
00069                             tot += inval*coeff;
00070                             totval += inval;
00071                         }
00072                     }
00073                 }
00074                 if (totval != 0){
00075                     outData[i][j] = (int) Math.round(10000 * tot / totval);
00076                 }
00077             }
00078         }
00079         return output;
00080     }
